Name: Accordion
Description: A vertically stacked set of interactive headings that each reveal an associated section of content.

SubComponentData.Name: Root
SubComponentData.Description: Contains all the parts of an accordion.

PropData.Name: asChild
PropData.Description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.  Read our Composition guide for more details.

PropData.Name: value
PropData.Description: Determines whether one or multiple items can be opened at the same time.

PropData.Name: defaultValue
PropData.Description: The value of the item to expand when initially rendered and type is "single". Use when you do not need to control the state of the items.

PropData.Name: onValueChange
PropData.Description: Event handler called when the expanded state of an item changes and type is "single".

PropData.Name: value
PropData.Description: Event handler called when the expanded state of an item changes and type is "single".

PropData.Name: defaultValue
PropData.Description: The value of the item to expand when initially rendered when type is "multiple". Use when you do not need to control the state of the items.

PropData.Name: onValueChange
PropData.Description: Event handler called when the expanded state of an item changes and type is "multiple".

PropData.Name: collapsible
PropData.Description: Event handler called when the expanded state of an item changes and type is "multiple".

PropData.Name: disabled
PropData.Description: When true, prevents the user from interacting with the accordion and all its items.

EnumData.Name: type
EnumData.Description: Determines whether one or multiple items can be opened at the same time.

EnumData.Name: dir
EnumData.Description: The reading direction of the accordion when applicable. If omitted, assumes LTR (left-to-right) reading mode.

EnumData.Name: orientation
EnumData.Description: The reading direction of the accordion when applicable. If omitted, assumes LTR (left-to-right) reading mode.

SubComponentData.Name: Item
SubComponentData.Description: Contains all the parts of a collapsible section.

PropData.Name: disabled
PropData.Description: When true, prevents the user from interacting with the item.

PropData.Name: value
PropData.Description: A unique value for the item.

SubComponentData.Name: Header
SubComponentData.Description: Wraps an Accordion.Trigger. Use the asChild prop to update it to the appropriate heading level for your page.

PropData.Name: asChild
PropData.Description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.  Read our Composition guide for more details.

SubComponentData.Name: Trigger
SubComponentData.Description: Toggles the collapsed state of its associated item. It should be nested inside of an Accordion.Header.

PropData.Name: asChild
PropData.Description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.  Read our Composition guide for more details.

SubComponentData.Name: Content
SubComponentData.Description: Contains the collapsible content for an item.

PropData.Name: asChild
PropData.Description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.  Read our Composition guide for more details.

PropData.Name: forceMount
PropData.Description: Used to force mounting when more control is needed. Useful when controlling animation with React animation libraries.
